author: David Davies
content: Severn and Tyne had actually already been decommissioned, the former in October 2017, the latter in May this year. Tyne was brought back into service about two months later, which gives a good insight into the amount of joined-up thinking going on in our government right now!

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy

author: Willy
content: We have a similar problem here in Maine. Maine only catches lobsters during a window of time. Alas the canadians can decimate the lobsters to their hearts content.
